channel.title: TRAIN Conference
channel.description: TRAIN Conference (Calgary, Alberta, Canada) offers seminars and resources to equip and encourage Christian Education workers in their ministry areas.

item.title: TRAIN 2006 Conference (November 3-4) -- Body Building
item.description: Engage in a TRAIN workout designed to shape up Christian Education leaders and workers in Christ's Body. Exercise any of these ministry muscle groups: children, youth, family, women, small groups, leadership and compassion. TRAIN is for the encouraging and equipping of Adult Ministry Leaders, Bible Study Leaders, Small Group Leaders, Apprentices and Coaches, Sunday School Teachers (all age levels), Children's Ministry Leaders - Pastors, Directors and Workers, Youth Ministry Leaders - Pastors, Workers and Sponsors, Young Adult Ministry Leaders, Women's Ministry Leaders, and Compassion Ministry Leaders.

item.title: Conference Information
item.description: The TRAIN 2006 Conference will be held at Grace Baptist Church -- 2670 Radcliffe Dr. SE, Calgary, AB, CANADA. Two new tracks this year are "Curriculum" and "Family Ministries". Check out the many new seminars offered this year, as well as a few well-received repeats from last year -- all designed to equip you with relevant and fresh ideas for your ministry.

item.title: Guest Speaker: Lou Leventhal -- "Illusions & Reality"
item.description: Internationally acclaimed Illusionist Lou Leventhal will present his fun and highly entertaining program, "Illusions & Reality," on Friday, November 3 at 7:30pm. Unbelievable stage illusions, live animals, audience participation, original music, infectious humour and inspiring spiritual truths are orchestrated into an exciting and fast-paced show that you won't want to miss.

item.title: Registration Information"
item.description: There are three ways to register for the TRAIN 2006 Conference: online (recommended), mail-in and walk-in. Tickets for just Lou Leventhal's Illusions & Reality on Friday night are also available. A list of hotels near the conference site is provided for convenience.

item.title: Exhibitors and Attending Churches
item.description: These are some of the exhibitors you'll see at the TRAIN 2006 Conference: Alberta Bible College, Alliance University College, AWANA, BCM International, Christian Publications, FaithLife Financial, Heart of a Child, Noonday Ventures, Pioneer Clubs, and Talbot Marketing.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Our privacy policy states what information we collect and what we do with it. We DON'T share any personally-identifiable information with any third parties. Also, individuals, churches and organizations are reminded that they may opt-in or opt-out of our mailing list at any time.

item.title: Who We Are
item.description: The first TRAIN Conference was held in 1983. Every year since, as the baton is passed on to new committe members, we hope that we will be able to encourage, train, provide purpose-filled resources and develop Christian workers and leaders. Contact us if you have any questions or comments, or if you are interested in volunteering with us in the future.

item.title: Plenty of Space Still Available
item.description: As of 2006/10/24, everyone who has registered for the conference so far is guarenteed admission to Lou Leventhal's show, and there are plenty of tickets still available.

item.title: Not Registered Yet? Walk-Ins Welcome!
item.description: Online registration is now closed. As of 2006/11/01, everyone who has registered for the conference so far is guarenteed admission to Lou Leventhal's show, and there are plenty of tickets still available. If you'd still like to register for the conference then please print off a paper registration form, fill it in and bring it with you on Friday night.

item.title: The TRAIN 2006 Conference is Over
item.description: The TRAIN 2005 Conference is now over. We trust and pray that you found encouragement in the Lord, and that you will continue to build up the body of Christ in your ministry area.
